alert.note: Alert for Harding; San Miguel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 5:13PM MDT until June 09 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... Southern Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 512 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles east of Maes, or 26 miles west of Mosquero, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conchas Dam, Conchas, Conchas Lake State Park and Bell Ranch. This includes State Road 104 between Mile Markers 71 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
